attributes.action: take measures making  MEP's expenses claims to be made public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
measures are needed  to make british mep's expenses/allowance claims to be made public to and make them accountable.   
financial disciplinary measures must  be taken against members who are guilty of misusing taxpayer's money. Their expenses should be published on the internet monthy  to ensure they are accountable to the public and to put an end to secrecy.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with European Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
